Support

SDK Online Forum

Adobe Online Forums are for the Adobe community's peer-to-peer discussions of both Adobe and formerly Macromedia products. Please note that these forums are not an official customer support channel for Adobe. If you require direct assistance or prefer to contact Support directly, please use our paid support programs or complimentary product support for registered users.

To access the Photoshop SDK Online Forum, follow these instructions :

  1. Go to Adobe Support Forums
  2. Click on "Photoshop and ImageReady"
  3. If you are a new user, you must either register or browse as a guest. To browse as a guest, Click on "Browse as Guest".
  4. If you are not a new user, you are directed to the Photoshop and ImageReady Forums page.
  5. Click on "Adobe Photoshop Developers (SDK)".

SDK Discussion Mailing List

The Adobe Developers Association maintains an electronic mailing list that is used as peer discussion for developers. It is unmoderated and is populated by developers just like yourself, offering peer discussion of software development kit, Adobe plug-ins, and related issues. The mailing list is for discussion of all of the SDKs that fall under the ADA: Graphics and Publishing, which includes Adobe After Effects, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe PageMaker, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe PhotoDeluxe, and Adobe Premiere; Acrobat; FrameMaker; and PageMaker. To join the discussion send an e-mail to:

sdk-requests@adobe.com
with the subject: SUBSCRIBE
and these fields in your message body:

  1. Your full name:
  2. Business name:
  3. Address:
  4. City:
  5. State:
  6. Country:
  7. Country code or Zip:
  8. Area code and phone number (business is fine):
  9. ADA member number:
    ("N/A" if not a member; "Info" if want info.)

Support

Support for the Adobe Photoshop Plug-In API is provided to members of the Adobe Solutions Network (ASN) Program.

In the U.S. and Canada, and outside Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and Japan, contact:
Adobe Solutions Network
Adobe Systems Incorporated
P.O. Box 609
Klamath Falls, OR 97601
